# Citation

Users are requested to acknowledge use of this code package by providing a citation as follows:

```text
Cole, T., Coh, S., & Vanderbilt, D. (2025). Python Tight Binding (PythTB).
Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.12721315
```

